attributes.comment:
I am an adoptive parent. My daughter is from China. I am sorry to hear that you are
considering raising the costs associated with adoption. Please reconsider this
increase. Adopting a child is a VERY costly undertaking, which unfortunately many
people cannot afford. Raising the fees will only make it more difficult and burdensome
to accomplish. The process of adoption from foreign countries is a long process,
which is often prolonged by the foreign country, to last longer than your allotted time
periods, which necessitates duplicate applications for your clearance. Please do not
make this process even more costly. thank you for your consideration.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Adoptive Parent, Rose Willette
